mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTI_PURCHASE_PRODUCT (REQUEST_ID, TRANSACTION_ID, PARTITION_ID, PURCHASE_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_AMT, AUTO_YN, AUTO_PERIOD_UNIT, AUTO_PERIOD_VALUE, SELLER_COMPANY, SELLER_NAME, SELLER_EMAIL, SELLER_REG_NUM, SELLER_PHONE, SELLER_ADDRESS, STATUS, PURCHASE_DT, CANCEL_DT, NOTI_CREATE_DT, NOTI_UPDATE_DT) VALUES (#{requestId}, #{transactionId}, #{partitionId}, #{purchaseId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productAmt}, #{autoYn}, #{autoPeriodUnit}, #{autoPeriodValue}, #{sellerCompany}, #{sellerName}, #{sellerEmail}, #{sellerRegNum}, #{sellerPhone}, #{sellerAddress}, #{status}, #{purchaseDt}, #{cancelDt}, #{notiCreateDt}, #{notiUpdateDt})
